meta.title: Golden Retriever Common Problems: Health & Behavior
meta.description: Common Golden Retriever problems including shedding, chewing, jumping, and health issues like hip dysplasia.

hero.title: Common Golden Retriever Challenges
hero.subtitle: What to expect when owning a Golden.

intro: Golden Retrievers are amazing dogs, but they aren't perfect. They shed heavily, can be mouthy, and are prone to specific health issues.

problems.title: Heavy Shedding
problems.description: Goldens shed year-round with heavy coat blows twice a year.

problems.title: Mouthiness / Chewing
problems.description: As retrievers, they love to carry things in their mouths and may chew if bored.

problems.title: Hip Dysplasia
problems.description: A genetic joint condition common in the breed.

solutions.title: Regular Grooming
solutions.description: Brush 2-3 times a week to manage shedding.

solutions.title: Provide Chew Toys
solutions.description: Give them appropriate outlets for their chewing instincts.
